name: Silah
description:
It is an online game you can join other's game by using browser or you can host your own game that will be showed on browser list, for hosting you must open port to 30695 TCP and UDP

HOW TO PLAY

After waiting 10 seconds in lobby, room's bottom becomes broken then everybody starts to collect coins and guns. 

Each weapon has its own specific cost coin to shoot

The jump and direction change key is single and it is the space key. You can change your direction while in the air.

For building platform you can press to E

If nobody wins at the end of the game, the walls blow up everybody.

F1 to fullscreen

INFORMATION

This game is made for Miz Jam 1 by just me. Main goal of Miz Jam 1 is everybody is making a game with same art kit in 48 hours. Also my game's mechanic, network, game loop and all other things took 48 hours in Godot Engine but making game browser didn't turn out as I hoped and took 48 hours alone because It was my first time with javascript and using Firestore as database. So actually 96 hours took to make this game :D . Database is for storing server ip and name thus anybody can see  anybody's server.

Todos:
